text:
Dynamic Duo, Zion.T, Primary and Crush will spread Korean hip-hop to Atlanta and New York. By
												

	Jeff Benjamin Korean hip-hop continues its international spread with two U.S. shows on the 2015 Amoeba Culture Tour, lead by Dynamic Duo. Dynamic Duo Reflect on Their Years in K-Pop: Exclusive Q&A The co-founders of Korea’s Amoeba Culture record label will embark on a tour that includes label-mates rappers Zion.T, Primary and Crush. It’s first stateside trek for the group. The crew will hit both Atlanta’s Wild Bills along with New York’s Terminal 5 in March. K-pop boy band VIXX just played Terminal 5 in November. Last year marked Dynamic Duo’s 15th anniversary on the scene, topped off with a collaboration album, A Giant Step, with legendary producer DJ Premier. A single off the LP, “Animal,” was named one of Billboard‘s best K-pop songs of 2014. Related		
	



















	
	
		
					BTS' V Drops Two Very Different Remixes of 'Slow Dancing' Solo Single		
	



	01/12/2015 Ticket information will be released Jan. 13 with tickets on sale Jan. 28. Both shows are 18+ only. 2015 Amoeba Culture TourMarch 27- Duluth, GA @ Wild Bills (8:30 p.m.)March 28 – New York, NY @ Terminal 5 (8:00 p.m.)   Daily newsletters straight to your inbox Send us a tip using our anonymous form. title: 2015 Amoeba Culture Tour: Dynamic Duo, Zion.T, Primary, Crush in NY and Atlanta | Billboard – Billboard
